website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, humble, yet long-lasting horse halter that features a stiff rope design that firmly stays in place and will retain its shape and bright color for a long time.
pros: Available in black and blue colors
Offered in small and large sizes
Stiff ropes hold its shape over time
cons: The large size may still be a little small for extra-large horse breeds

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer and will continue to be! Amazing quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these rope halters for my gelding, from Knotty Girlz and have been extremely pleased with both! The first one i bought when he was a yearling and hes now 4 yrs old, so hes since graduated to his "big boy" halter. The colors are vibrant (& stay that way), super adjustable, the poly cord is very flexible. Not stiff and not floppy. Even after being well used for years! I will continue to purchase these specific halters, from this company, for the rest of my life & would gladly recommend them to anyone interested in a great quality & affordable halter! ~Extremely satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Cinton Anderson without the cost!
customer_reviews.text: On par with the ridiculously expensive Clinton Anderson halters/lead ropes. I have held this brand and Clintons brand and they are fundamentally the same just without his name on it. Save you some $$$ and get this! I bought this a months ago and it has kept it's color and stiffness after multiple uses. Just to give you an idea on how well this halter works as far as pressure, I use this halter as a bitless bridle. My horse responds better to it than she did when she rode with a bit!
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: To any one who says it the wrong size is there own fault in ordering sizes. The material is great, yes it has knots for training as the title says, I bought mine with a matching lead rope to work with a (large) Clydesdale Yearling and the large will be perfect. Color is amazing shipping was great, can’t say enough good things about this.
customer_reviews.author: aleemorse

customer_reviews.title: This halter went beyond my expectations!  Will be getting more of these for the rest of my heard!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this halter except for the nose. I wish the nose was just a little bit bigger. My filly (5 months old) has a very small delicate face, the nose is a little small/ snug, but she has lots of room to grow through the pole (weanling size) . Because of this I'm probably gonna have to get her the yearling size here really soon and it's going to be huge all around. Love the quality and craftsmanship of this halter! ** Friend added the para cord to this halter, it does not come with the pretty details. Halter was snug before para cord was added.**
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter that's half the price of the Clinton Anderson ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice halter that's half the price of the Clinton Anderson one I have for my other horse. I would behoove him to set fair prices, but he seems a bit greedy. This halter has the same, stiff quality that's important for subtle, vibrational cues and tiny corrections. My horse now stands and tips her nose into it, because I promise to be very careful with the nerves the knots contact. I recommend anyone who's using rope halters do the same. A little vibration goes a long way and is generally all you need to communicate effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Record

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but pliable, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Want better control with your training? These stiff halters are amazing. The knots on the nose give just a little added pressure when you need it while ground training. The stiff rope stays open when haltering so there is no scaring the horse by chasing it around with a floppy halter! It stays tied where it is suppose to, and I have even used it as a bit less bridle when riding my older horse. Good all around piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Rider

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value
customer_reviews.text: These are great halters, and compare with those of Clinton Anderson (my favorite trainer). Am especially pleased with the "small horse" size, which I could not find elsewhere -- it fits my 14h quarter horse appendix perfectly. I've also purchased several Knotty Girlz rope halters for our foal as she continues to grow. Very study, excellent quality, and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect halter for my pig of a Irish draft mare
customer_reviews.text: This halter is near perfect! It is stiff and works great. For my Irish draft x mustang mare, i bought the draft size (not the large). It fits perfect, other than the noseband knots being slightly too close together for her nose (i wish they were slightly farther apart so it seated on each side of that nose bone for better control). I love this halter regardless- the pink is more of a coral pink than a hot pink but it's still beautiful. My old-timey vet says this is like the original rope halters and loves how stiff it is. Great product and will continue to order!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love this halter. Honestly was a lifesaver. This halter with the strategically placed knots made training my colt doable. Prior to getting this halter, I was pulled around by my colt like a rag doll. He respects the pressure points and is now leading around everywhere like a pro. It is very well made and love love the colors. It fits perfectly on my weanling and bought the yearling size as well. I am not a professional trainer but felt like this halter gave me the edge to halter train my colt on my own. Would highly recommend this. It is much safer than allowing the colt rear and fall over backwards and get hurt with a regular halter.
customer_reviews.author: Momandnana

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived 4 days after I ordered it. That wasn't expected at all but was really cool! My receipt was included in the packaging with a handwritten "Thank You". Are you kidding me? NO ONE does that anymore. But most importantly - the quality of this product!! I'm blown away. I'm about to forward this halter to my friends and post on Social Media pages because it's THAT impressive. Soon as I have a picture with the halter on my horses I'll add to the review. Thank you Knotty Girlz, you're earned a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great halter for a Clydesdale.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome halter and great price. I was having a hard time finding a rope halter for my Clydesdale and came upon this one on Amazon. The halter fits him well and looks so nice. Quality is that of a clinician halter. I did have to tinker a little with the knot under the chin to get a little more room in the nose section, but had enough to get a good fit without being too tight. I would definitely purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rope halter at a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these halters! Comparable to Clinton Anderson halters at 1/2 the price. A lot better color selection too! Quick delivery and I mistakenly ordered two on my first order and they processed a quick return although I ended up reordering another one in another color because I was very happy with the quality, stiffness of the rope, and fit. Im a trainer & I recommended them to several people at my barn and especially those clients who work their horses with a lot of groundwork exercises. They quickly placed their orders too!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa V.

customer_reviews.title: It fits my big guy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy a draft horse halter on amazon but we cant go out, so I did it. I feel it is good quality and it actually fits him. I am new to the rope halter fad but my trainer really thought it would help with my stubborn gelding. She was right. I got the one with extra knot points totally recommend he is way more responsive in this halter than the other nylon one.
customer_reviews.author: Red Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halter!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this halter. Made the mistake of ordering another rope halter thinking they’re all the same. The other halter unknotted too easily on new horse that tugs/jerks head a lot. This halter has more rigidity/stiffness to it so the knot doesn’t easily get undone with stretching. Compared to a standard halter, this rope halter provides a lot more control over both my horses - will not use any other halters. Colors are great (blue and teal) and can throw them in washing machine and they come out brand new looking.
customer_reviews.author: Heide A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Yet you may want to size up!
customer_reviews.text: This halter is really well made and is definitely comparable to Clinton Anderson’s brand. JUST REMEMBER to look at the size chart carefully and take your horses measurements because I found them to run a bit small, especially around the nose band. I had to return the Arab size and get a standard size because even though my Arab gelding is a small, delicate faced guy, the Arab size was way too small. So yes you may want to get a size larger than you expect, a little large is better than too small. Also, LOVE the beige color on my chestnut. Will definitely buy again if ever in need of another!
customer_reviews.author: D Mauss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Clinton Anderson halter without the price tag! Flexible enough to store anywhere with enough durability to last. The knots across the nose are evenly and properly spaced to put pressure in the right spots for ground work but are still soft and dont cause any rubbing along the nose. The color is pretty true to the advertised pictures and it is beautiful. All in all this is an amazing halter that you dont have to sacrifice quality for looks!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for my naughty mini donkeys!
customer_reviews.text: Knotty girlz harness for a naughty mini donkeys training gear. Doesn't want to pull against the knots strategically located. I got the more firm one, and their wide range of sizes was great. Shipping was fast. Good price, strong &well made. Leads are too expensive in my opinion, got that else where, but barnes is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Love these products!!!  Halter fits amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this halter (purchased the matching lead also), and I love the company! The first halter I bought (XL) was too small around the nose for my big draft cross, so I returned and got the draft size. It’s a tad long in the crown, but I simply double knot. The halter fits great, and my horse responds so well to it! Very pleased! Halter (and lead rope) are both very durable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LCat

customer_reviews.title: Nose band very small
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because shipping was very fast and the halter material was excellent as described. However the nose band is too small for my draft horses although I ordered a draft size halter. Fortunately I have Morgan horses as well and it fits them perfectly so not a total waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzai

customer_reviews.title: They never get to tight to untie. Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Held up to an unbroken three-year-old thoroughbred had to pull him into a trailer which he did not cooperate with altar showed no signs of wear after he thrashed against it while it was tied off to the trailer, and much to my surprise and delight even though it was Tugged hard the knot did not become too tight to simply undo by hand I figured for sure I was going to have to take pliers to it after he snapped it so hard. We like these halters enough that all of our foals for sale will be sold with one included just to spread the word. They also aren’t too bulky to fit under other tack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Halter, and great price. I bought one from a famous trainer a few years back for 50.00. Never again the ones I bought from Amazon are 30.00 cheaper and exactly the same rope halter, I will tell my friends. GREAT DEAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrs. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I enjoy supporting a small, female owned equestrian business, these halters are fantastic! These are absolutely comparable to Clinton Anderson knotted/clinician halters for far, far less! I have recommended many clients buy these halters, as they hold up, come in great color options, sizes, and stiffness. I have purchased well over 3 dozen of these halters, for both professional use and for clinics, some purchased years ago and they are still reliable and durable. These are a must buy for most equestrians!
customer_reviews.author: Calie Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great halter. I bought the weanling size for my 4 month old paint. Fits great. It IS stiff, but that’s what the listing says. This is my first rope halter, so I can’t compare to others, but this seems like a quality product, and I’ve been told, one of the closest to Clinton Anderson’s version.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Busscher

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Great purchase for the price.

(Turquoise) it's vibrant and more beautiful that I could have imagined. Almost like an aqua... The stiffness of the rope was also just what I had hoped for. I ordered a yearling for my 14 month old Gelding. He has a delicate halter horse head and this won't fit him for long... But it does fit him perfect for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, reliable service! Quality Halters

Thank you so much for making these halters and sharing them with the horse community! I will definitely be recommending you guys!

I really am having trouble even using these halters. I don't know what I'll do with them. They won't fit my horses, mules, or Welsh ponies.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great halter

They tend to run small so measure. I bought her a weanling size first but she grew out of it before she was a yearling so I bought regular size this time and it fits her great...
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice halter, nice solid rope and knotted just right.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Clinton Anderson's own brand of rope halters before, and have to say this product is just as nice as those but at a much more reasonable price point. customer_reviews.author: Sonja Dake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, just do NOT leave it on your horse un-attended. If it gets caught on a gate or fence It won’t break and your horse will either get hurt or worse. I still have my horse but she will have scars. My fault not the halters fault.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie Gee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice halter
customer_reviews.text: This halter is every bit as nice as another rope halter that I bought from a big name trainer for more than twice the cost. This one is stiff and well done. Can't really comment on durability as I've just started using it but I have high hopes for it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great halter!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this halter because some of the other reviews said that it was comparable to the Clinton Anderson rope halters and it really is! It's nice and stiff and has the 4 knots on the nose band. I ended up ordering 2 more and they work great. I ordered the yearling size for a pony and it worked perfectly. Standard worked well for the quarter horses. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 Knotty Girlz rope halters and leads in October for my 2 youngsters. I LOVE them. They’re the perfect colors I can never find in stores, even with daily use on my swamp monsters who are out to pasture 24/7 in rainy WA they look brand new after 6 months. I’m ordering another set up for my POA mare now, and I’m sure eventually my whole herd (of 7) will have these halters!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong, not flimsy at all
customer_reviews.text: I got this halter for my 17 hand standardbred that has a tendency to be headstrong. This halter was fantastic and really got his attention when I was leading him so he was much easier to handle. The quality of the halter is good although the knots at the bottom tend to slide more than I would like. Overall this is a halter I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Land

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: These halters are just what I was looking for! Very stiff and knots in the right spot. The large is large on my big headed appy, but works with adjustment. I like they work for the slightest correction or cue. At a much better price! I'd definitely buy another in the future from this business.
customer_reviews.author: Esp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rope halter.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good quality rope halter. However, it is pretty stiff and the knots on the nose are fairly large. If you are looking for control it would work very well. Probably not comfortable for every day use but may work well for training. I have a smaller quarter horse and the knots were not in a good place on the nose. The knots can probably be undone and moved, but I have not tried to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Knox

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this halter!! I have a gelding who has an exceptionally large head and a special talent of busting halters so getting a halter that was thick enough and stiff enough for training and everyday wear and tear was super important to me. In all honesty I was very worried about ordering a halter online just because I knew I was going to be picky and didn't want to spend money on junk that would bust easily, but I am so glad I did because this is the nicest quality rope halter I've ever owned not to mention how bright and beautiful the color is!
customer_reviews.author: Saylor

customer_reviews.title: I love these halters
customer_reviews.text: I love these halters. I can't tell the difference between them and the much more expensive halters (not mentioning any names). Very good quality. This is my second purchase and I'm sure won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Tyanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halter with the fair price tag
customer_reviews.text: I Love this training halter!! No different than C. Anderson's . Not going to pay those prices for the name! Just not vein like that. Thank you Knotty Girlz for caring about absolute quality at a fair price. I will be back.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great Halter & Great Price

customer_reviews.author: Lynk

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!

customer_reviews.author: luvskuls

customer_reviews.title: Love this halter!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this halter for my horse. She is young and going through some training, the knots above the nose help keep her focused. Also, there is a nice color selection.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprised I didn't write a review sooner! I love this halter. It's been a huge help with my yearling, I can definitely tell she respects it without me needing to be harsh. Lovely quality and durability. I plan on getting a beige one soon to to some photoshoots with!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: quality

customer_reviews.author: Terry Harris

customer_reviews.title: Clinton Anderson at 1/2 the price!

It fits not only my small headed paint, but my huge head haflinger too (but remember to order up in size!). I love the color, the pressure point knots make lunging my haflinger less of a arm wrestling match then on a flat halter. I will be purchasing more to come!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.author: Corina Rabidue

customer_reviews.title: Tough rope halter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality. The Best.

customer_reviews.author: MR-LR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - use for training
customer_reviews.text: This halter has been great for re-training our young OTTB. The quality and weight of the halter is superior, and I like that there is no metal band at the end of the tie strap. The pressure point knots are very correctly positioned and useful in getting the horse to listen and understand without handler interference. We use this halter solely for training - it is so we'll made, I would not recommend turning a horse out in it.

customer_reviews.title: Love this halter!

customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Super quality. Very well made. Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love this halter. Same quality as Double Diamond and other well known makers. Would definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Draft Size Too Small.

customer_reviews.author: Michael Eakins

customer_reviews.title: Halter just as described

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
